main event: A UFO sighting was reported on November 10, 1953, in Dayton, Ohio, where an object was seen moving northward.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be traveling at 60 to 80 mph at an altitude of 1000 to 2000 feet., The observation lasted for approximately 1 minute., It was described as a bright light that was not visible to the naked eye during the entire observation., The conclusion stated there was insufficient information to identify the object., The witness was driving across a bridge when the sighting occurred.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: The witness was driving across a bridge in Dayton.
